issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add validation for unreferenced table in query
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8260](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8260). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an edge case but the query "SELECT 1 FROM t" causes an error in the Parquet reader because we are not reading any columns. We should have the query planner recognize this and fail the query is invalid.
